name: Dr. Exorcist
description:
Meet the team!

David Costa - Gameplay programmer

Telmo Francisco - Gameplay programmer

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dr. Exorcist was a university project that we had to do together with a companion app.

So, note that the game is just a prototype, and its not the final product. 

Note: The login/register and the companion app are not working right now because everything was connected through a server and this server is not available anymore.
